item.description:
Hi Everyone...

Kick off March in style!

The first Friday of each month, 5:30-9:30 pm

Begin each month in a unique and stylish atmosphere at mfafirstfridays. Join us in the Koch Gallery for fine art, live music, cash bars featuring signature cocktails, and a delicious tapas menu. Relax and unwind in the breathtaking ambience with friends both old and new.

March 6 - Four Piece Suit

Members: entry is FREE
Nonmembers: entry is FREE with Museum admission

Hope to see you there!

Cheers,
Michael

PS- mfafirstfridays Musical Lineup for 2009:

March 6 - Four Piece Suit
April 3 - DJ Deja: Denise LaCarubba*
May 1 - Uziel Colon Latin Jazz Trio
June 5 - Andrew Stern Jazz Ensemble

*Please join us on April 3 for special performances and dance instruction provided by the MIT Ballroom Dance Team.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: The MFA -First Fridays - Come for the Art and stay for a drink
